data.name: T001
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for the opportunity provided in analysing your insurance needs and to recommend some solutions!

Need analysis is attached herewith for your reference and kind consideration. We expect you to go through this carefully and take the best decision in the interest of your loved ones.
You could always contact our Wealth Planner on txtWPMobileNo or directly our Head Office on 0112310310 in case you need more clarity on this!

All the best and take care!

AIA Team

data.name: T002
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for the opportunity provided in analysing your insurance needs and recommending the best suited solution for you and your loved ones!

Quotation generated after analysing your needs is attached here with for your reference and kind consideration. We expect you to go through this carefully and take the best decision in the interest of your loved ones.
Quote Number txtQuoteNo
Product Name txtProductName
Premium (Dh) txtPremium/-
Policy Term txtPolicyTerm years
Premium Paying Term txtPPTerm years
You could always contact our Wealth Planner on txtWPMobileNo or directly our Head Office on 0112310310 in case you need more clarity on this!

All the best and Take care !

Metlife Team

data.name: T003
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as your life insurance partner and forwarding us the life insurance application!

This proposal will be the basis of the contract between you and MetLife as your insurance policy will be issued based on the information disclosed in this application form.

Your application is being processed and we will update you on the progress.
Quote Number txtQuoteNo
Proposal Number txtProposalNo
Product Name txtProductName
Premium txtPremium/-
Please keep this proposal securely saved as this is a valuable legal document which forms the basis of this insurance contract.

Please go through same carefully and get back to us immediately if you find any wrongly disclosed information / facts.

looking forward to serving you for many more years !

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team
IMPORTANT NOTICE: The information in this txtEnvronment email (and any attachments) is confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not use or disseminate the information. data.name: T004
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as you life insurance partner and forwarding us a life insurance application.

We kindly request you to comply with the following requirements at your earliest possible to enable us proceed with your application.

1. Medical examinations/ laboratory tests as stated in the attached letter. (Please take a copy of this letter when you present yourself for the medical examinations)
2. Personal Financial questionnaire attached herewith

We will update you on the progress on receipt of the above requirements.
Quote Number txtQuoteNo
Product Name txtProductName
Premium txtPremium/-
Policy Start Date txtPolicyStartDate
Policy End Date txtPolicyEndDate
Looking forward to serving you for many more years!

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team

data.name: T005
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
While thanking you, we acknowledge the receipt of the following requirements for your proposal.

strQuotesTable
However, we are yet to receive the following requirements. We appreciate if you could forward us the same at your earliest possible to expedite the issuance of your life insurance policy.

strQuotesNonMedicalTable
You could always contact your Wealth Planner on txtWPMobileNo or directly the Head Office on 0112310310 if you need more clarity in this regard.

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team

data.name: T006
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
We are compelled to cancel your life insurance proposal in 15 days unless you comply with the due requirements before that date.

We require these information to proceed with your application and hope you will make necessary arrangements to forward us same at your earliest possible.

We urge you to attend this matter urgently in securing the future of you and your loved ones!
Please contact your Wealth Planner on txtWPMobileNo or Head Office on 0112310310 if you need more clarity on this.

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team

data.name: T007
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as your insurance partner and forwarding us the life insurance application.

We have gone through same carefully and regret to inform you of our inability to offer you a life insurance cover considering your txtdeclinedecision.

We would request you to seek medical advice on your condition.
Deposit paid towards your insurance application will be refunded to you in due course after deducting medical expenses, if any.

Wish you all the Best and Take care!!

AIA Team

data.name: T008
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as your insurance partner and forwarding us the life insurance application.

We have gone through same carefully and regret to inform you of our inability to offer you a life insurance cover at this juncture, considering your txtdeclinedecision.

However, we are prepared to reconsider our decision in txtDuration months subject to a fresh set of medicals.

Also we would request you to seek medical advice on your condition.
Deposit paid towards your insurance application will be refunded to you in due course after deducting medical expenses, if any.

Wish you all the Best and Take care!!

AIA Team

data.name: T009
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as your life insurance partner and forwarding us a life insurance application.

On the request made by you, we have cancelled your life insurance application txtProposalNo and the deposit paid will be refunded to you in due course.

It was nice serving you and would prefer to serve you again should you wish to reconsider your decision at a later date.
You may contact your Wealth Planner txtWPMobileNo or directly the Head Office on 0112310310 for such assistance!

We wish you all the best !

AIA Team

data.name: T010
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
We are pleased to inform you that we have issued your life insurance policy and we warmly welcome you on board!

You will soon receive your life insurance policy and we urge you to go through same and be familiar with the terms and conditions applicable to the contract!
Looking forward for serving you for many more years,

All the best and take care !

AIA Team

data.name: T011
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for selecting MetLife as your life insurance partner and forwarding us a life insurance application.

We have carefully evaluated your insurance proposal and connected reports and wish to accept the same subject to certain clauses as indicated in the attached conditional letter of acceptance.

Kindly go through same and provide us with your consent to proceed with issuing the policy as stated therein.
Looking forward to serving you for many more years

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team

data.name: T016
data.value:
Dear txtSurName txtName,
Thank you for choosing MetLife as your life insurance partner and forwarding us the life insurance application!

With reference to the previous email regarding the medical examinations which you need to submit for us to consider your life insurance proposal, please refer the attached medical request letter. You could either take a printed copy of this letter or present the soft copy of the letter to the laboratory at the time of medical examination.

We will update you on the progress on receipt of the above requirements.

looking forward to serving you for many more years !

All the best and Take care !

AIA Team
